entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Golden
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:03 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Golden Airport 02:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

Pressure: 99.4 kPa
Humidity: 88 %

entry.title: Monday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4 with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 20 February 2023
